scripts.test: npm run-script test-local && npm run-script test-browser
scripts.test-browser: browserify -t coffeeify -t [babelify --presets env] spec/frontend/*.*  | tape-run | tap-spec
scripts.release: npm run-script build-client && npm run-script build-server
scripts.build-client: browserify -i ws -t coffeeify -t [babelify --presets env] -r ./src/uebersicht.js:uebersicht client.coffee | uglifyjs -c > release/public/client.js
scripts.build-server: browserify -t coffeeify --node --detect-globals false --no-bundle-external server.coffee > release/server.js && cd release && npm prune --production && npm install --production --no-progress
